recipe_name: Hot sweet and sour strawberries with vanilla ice cream
author: Tony Tobin
method: Heat the oil, vinegar, sugar and red wine in a small frying pan for 2-3 minutes, until thickened, then add the strawberries. Stir well to coat the strawberries and cook for a further minute. To serve, transfer to a serving bowl, pour over some of the pan syrup and serve with a large scoop of ice cream.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  1 tbsp red wine vinegar,  1 tbsp caster sugar,  2 tbsp red wine,  55g/2oz strawberries, tips left on,  vanilla ice cream, to serve
